inclusion: village selcted for remoteness, convenience sample of children
children attending hospital with fever or tachycardia

diarrhoeal study controls:
healthy age- and sex-matched children without diarrhoea and antibiotic use during the previous 7 days
patients within 48h of admission and one main caregiver
random sample of humans with no abx/hospital exposure last 3 m
hospitalised for diarrhoea, hospitaliased for disease other than diarrhoea

participants who reared animals, 
presented with a fever and/or diarrhea but without malaria
